dt: the southern extension of the Rhaetian Alps on the border between Italy and Switzerland; highest peak
(highest in the Rhaetian Alps) 13,200 feet (4023 meters)

shortdef: the southern extension of the Rhaetian Alps on the border between Italy and Switzerland; highest peak Piz Bernina (highest in the Rhaetian Alps) 13,200 feet (4023 meters)
